ghostPost.title: Reminder: Create your Particl Wallet ✔️
ghostPost.excerpt: As we prepare for the Particl platform launch we want to ensure the smoothest launch possible and we want to say “Thank You” ...
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: As we prepare for the Particl platform launch we want to ensure the smoothest launch possible and we want to say “Thank You” ...
ghostPost.plaintext:
As we prepare for the Particl platform launch we want to ensure the smoothest
launch possible and we want to say “Thank You” to everyone who has already
prepared their first Particl wallet following our quick 10 minute guide.

This is extremely important as your PART tokens will automatically be
distributed to these addresses when mainnet launches. To date, 77% of our
funding contributors have set their receiving address up which is fantastic!
We’re hoping to have >90% of you set this up before we launch so it reduces the
extra load on the team to manually distribute tokens after launch.

Still need to set up wallet? START HERE:
 * Guide: How to Generate your Particl Wallet —
   https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1

Alternative guides:
 * Video Tutorial: How to generate Particl exchange passphrase —
   https://youtu.be/lSjLsCkabEk
 * Guide: How to Verify your Particl Wallet Recovery —
   https://medium.com/@rynomster/guide-how-to-verify-your-particl-wallet-recovery-7ef91d435a19

Current statistics:
 * 1278 out of 1660 contributors have created their first PART address — 77%
 * 5,392,986 PART is linked to receiving addresses — 75.7%
 * 123,532 PART has been donated by contributors for Community Initiative #1
   [https://particl.news/a-community-driven-initiative-e26724100c3a]
 * 24,706 PART (20%) has been pledged by foundation as a match for this fund
 * Claims: 146 applications and 235,000 SDC in claims

Thank you,

Particl Team

primary_tag.name: News
primary_tag.description: Keep track of all the news related to Particl and its ecosystem!

tags.name: News
tags.description: Keep track of all the news related to Particl and its ecosystem!

prev.plaintext:
We appreciate the patience the Particl community, developers, contributors and
testers have shown over the past 2 months. We know waiting for something this
exciting for this long can challenge even the most dedicated supporter.

> Unus pro omnibus, omnes pro uno (latin) — “One for all, and all for one” —
Swiss motto [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Switzerland]
In our June 6th update
[https://particl.news/project-update-june-6th-2017-eeec12500754] we pushed the
anticipated mainnet release to June 30th based on the information we had at the
time; that we would have confirmation of the foundation creation in hand early
this week. June 30th would have allowed us a few days to prepare for mainnet.
Since the team still has not received confirmation (not alarming, just busy) and
although it is very possible it could come in the next 24–72 hrs that does not
leave us enough time to prepare and give notice for mainnet. Therefore as things
stand it is very likely that there will be a delay beyond the anticipated 30th
June date. PART tokens can not be created or distributed without our Swiss
foundation in operation to oversee the process.

5 things to do while you wait for PART:
 1. Create your Particl wallet to ensure you get access to your PART on launch 
    https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1
 2. Join testers in our Slack with TESTNET#3 featuring RingCT: +Particl
    Testnet — Getting Started
    [https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/d9yhExvCaW6vCp3qLUwuW]
 3. Get access to your PART tokens (they’ll be testnet tokens) ahead of launch
    and play with staking, voting, donating and untraceable, unlinkable
    transactions all on top of bitcoin’s robust codebase.
 4. Join us for our 2nd team AMA hosted by the ARK community. Wednesday June
    28th, 9am PT in the #trading_altcoins channel on ARK slack.

https://ark.io/slack5. Help grow Particl’s user base ahead of launch:

 * Leverage Steemit platform/users by creating articles on Particl dev team
   bringing Confidential Transactions, RingCT, voting and governance to
   bitcoin’s codebase and how that is good for all. Tag using #particl
 * Reddit/Twitter/Bitcointalk posts that get word out about Particl’s upcoming
   privacy features, significance of privacy in anticipation of marketplace,
   significance of choice of privacy (RingCT or CT)
 * Articles on Particl staking, passive income opportunities by running a node,
   especially when marketplace starts getting used around the world.
 * Get Involved. As the project is getting closer to mainnet the team is looking
   for more community growth and participation opportunities. This could be
   helping with our social channels (twitter, reddit, etc), creating a
   development community for Particl, creating a writing community and gathering
   graphic, design orientated individuals to help with promotions, marketing and
   PR.

As we near the end of our wait I ask you to hold strong and prepare for world
domination.

Thank you,

Particl Team
prev.html:
We appreciate the patience the Particl community, developers, contributors and testers have shown over the past 2 months. We know waiting for something this exciting for this long can challenge even the most dedicated supporter.

Unus pro omnibus, omnes pro uno (latin) — “One for all, and all for one” — Swiss motto

In our June 6th update we pushed the anticipated mainnet release to June 30th based on the information we had at the time; that we would have confirmation of the foundation creation in hand early this week. June 30th would have allowed us a few days to prepare for mainnet. Since the team still has not received confirmation (not alarming, just busy) and although it is very possible it could come in the next 24–72 hrs that does not leave us enough time to prepare and give notice for mainnet. Therefore as things stand it is very likely that there will be a delay beyond the anticipated 30th June date. PART tokens can not be created or distributed without our Swiss foundation in operation to oversee the process.

5 things to do while you wait for PART:

  1. Create your Particl wallet to ensure you get access to your PART on launch https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1
  2. Join testers in our Slack with TESTNET#3 featuring RingCT: +Particl Testnet — Getting Started
  3. Get access to your PART tokens (they’ll be testnet tokens) ahead of launch and play with staking, voting, donating and untraceable, unlinkable transactions all on top of bitcoin’s robust codebase.
  4. Join us for our 2nd team AMA hosted by the ARK community. Wednesday June 28th, 9am PT in the #trading_altcoins channel on ARK slack.

5. Help grow Particl’s user base ahead of launch:

  • Leverage Steemit platform/users by creating articles on Particl dev team bringing Confidential Transactions, RingCT, voting and governance to bitcoin’s codebase and how that is good for all. Tag using #particl
  • Reddit/Twitter/Bitcointalk posts that get word out about Particl’s upcoming privacy features, significance of privacy in anticipation of marketplace, significance of choice of privacy (RingCT or CT)
  • Articles on Particl staking, passive income opportunities by running a node, especially when marketplace starts getting used around the world.
  • Get Involved. As the project is getting closer to mainnet the team is looking for more community growth and participation opportunities. This could be helping with our social channels (twitter, reddit, etc), creating a development community for Particl, creating a writing community and gathering graphic, design orientated individuals to help with promotions, marketing and PR.

As we near the end of our wait I ask you to hold strong and prepare for world domination.

Thank you,

Particl Team
